description: Field coupling stabilization optimization - Cross-Repository Integration
technical_details: Field coupling mechanisms require optimization for enhanced magnetic monopole field configurations with cross-repository validation across lqg-polymer-field-generator, warp-field-coils, and unified-lqg systems. Dynamic field coupling matrix C_ij needs stabilization across repository boundaries.
implementation_scope: Enhanced magnetic monopole field coupling optimization with cross-repository parameter harmonization
expected_solution: Enhanced field coupling matrix optimization C_ij with cross-repository parameter stabilization protocol
